name: Garden Deep
description:
Unfortunately unfinished Ludum Dare 48 Jam submission.

The world is falling out from underneath you, going deeper and deeper. Can you garden your way out?

Intended to implement game mechanics that involved gardening which created new blocks for you to stand on as the world sank deeper and deeper, but I only got to the point of creating the world the game is set in and some controls for manipulating the blocks.

Controls:

Left Click on block

Arrow Keys

I

R

Space

Reload the page to restart the game
